name: 吳建文
objective: The database systems course is to introduce the database concepts and the application techniques. It covers the following topics: database introduction, data records and structures, relational models, SQL language, relational database design, dependency and normalization, distributed databases and parallel processing.
schedule:
Week 1~2: database introduction
Week 3~4: data records and structures
Week 5~6: relational models
Week 7~9: SQL language
Week 10~11: relational database design
Week 12~14: distributed databases 
Week 15~18: database projects
materials:
Database System Concepts, 5th Ed.
Silberschatz, Korth and Sudarshan
